topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553f2f7663687205628c3e00#post_553f2f7663687205628c3e00
One thing That stands out to me is that the eyes are differently sized. A good way of keeping them even is by drawing two  horizontal lines across the face with space between them equal to what you want the height of the eyes to be. The same can be done with ears or any other things that you want to be symmetrical.

topics.body:
Zoro: What is it?

Luffy: It's our new flag!

Zoro: Yeah, But what's it supposed to be of?

Luffy: It's a horse doing Zumba! But note the eyes, His confusion from his poor coordination is compounded by his inability to express his emotions!

Zoro: Why does it have an erection?

Luffy: ...For glory Zoro! For glory!
